column2: "Ao
column3: kurow a nkyɛ no mu mba dɔɔ so no mbrɛ oedua ayɛ bɔɔ a! Mbrɛ oedua ayɛ dɛ kunafo a
column4: ɔno a nkyɛ ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ amanaman mu! Nyia nkyɛ ɔyɛ ɔhembaa wɔ amantɔw mu no

column2: "Osu ara na osu anadwe
column3: na ne nyinsuwa eguar no. N'adɔfo nyinara mu no
column4: onnya obiara a ɔkyekye no werɛ: ne mfɛfo nyinara etwitwa no nkontompɔ

column2: "Juda etu kɔ ndɔmmum mu wɔ amandzehu mu
column3: na ɔsom kɛse da no do; Ndɛ ɔtse amanamamfo mu
column4: na onnya ahomgyebea biara. Hɔn a wɔtaa no do no nyinara akɔto no dɛ oehin mu ahar mu."

column2: "Zion n'akwan rutwa ewuo
column3: osiandɛ obi mmba nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn no ase; No mbobokɛse nyinara mu ayɛ bɔɔ
column4: n'asɔfoe risi nkrum: Ne nkataasia werɛ ahow
column5: na noara so ayɛ no wenwen."

column2: "N'ahohiahiafo abɛyɛ banodzifo
column3: n'atamfo ayɛ prɔmprɔm; Na EWURADZE ahyɛ no awerɛhow
column4: wɔ ne mbrato dodow ntsi: Ne mba nkakramba edzi atamfo enyim kɔ ndɔmmum mu."

column2: "Zion babaa n'akɛseyɛ no
column3: ne nyinara efi no ho kɔ. Ne mbapɔmba ayɛ dɛ ntwe a wonnya edzidzibea
column4: woguan hɔn etsiwfo enyim kɔ a wonnyi ahoɔdzen."

column2: "Jerusalɛm n'awerɛhow na n'amandzehu nda no mu no
column3: ɔkaa dza ɔsom no bo nyinara a ɔwɔ hɔ fir tsetse nda mu no: Ber a ne man kɔtɔɔ atamfo nsamu

column2: "Jerusalɛm ayɛ bɔn kɛsekɛse; dɛm ntsi ɔayɛ atwetwesidze. Hɔn a wodzii no nyi nyinara no
column3: wommbu no bi

column2: "Ne fi kekaa n'asetar mu; ɔanndwen ne daakye ho; dɛm ntsi na ɔabrɛ adze nwionn no; a onnyi ɔwerɛkyekyefo biara no. O EWURADZE
column3: hwɛ m'amandzehu; osiandɛ ɔtamfo no edzi konyim."

column2: "Ahohiahianyi no atserɛw ne nsamu akata dza ɔsom no bo nyinara do; Mpo oehu dɛ amanamamfo ahɛn no krɔnkrɔnbea
column3: Nyew
column4: hɔn a ehyɛɛ hɔn ho mbra dɛ mma wɔnnhɛn wo mboanofo mu no a."

column2: "Ne man nyinara si nkrum
column3: ber a wɔrohwehwɛ edziban; Wɔdze dza ɔsom hɔn bo amema agye edziban a wɔdze bɔdwedwe ɔkra: EWURADZE e
column5: na hu; mbrɛ mo ho esi ayɛ nkɔw."

column2: "Hom a hom rutwa mu sen nyina
column3: aso ɔnnyɛ hom asɛm bi? Hom nhwɛ
column4: na hom nhu kyerɛ dɛ yaw bi wɔ hɔ a ɔtse dɛ me yaw a aka me a EWURADZE dze ahow mo werɛ wɔ n'ebufuhyew da mu yi."

column2: "Ofir ɔsor na ɔasoma ogya
column3: na ahɛnhɛn me mbiew mu
column4: na oedzidzi mu: Oesua m'anan efir
column5: ɔasan me ekyir; Ɔama mayɛ kyirpaanyi na matɔ bitsi adzekyee nyina."

column2: "Ɔdze ne nsa akyekyer me mbrato ayɛ no kɔndua no; Wɔdze hɔn atoatoa mu
column3: woedu mo kɔn ho; ɔama m'ahoɔdzen apa. EWURADZE eyi me ahyɛ hɔn a munntum hɔn enyim gyina nsa."

column2: "EWURADZE ammfa m'akatakyi a wɔtse mo mu no annyɛ hwee; Ɔafrɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn etsia me dɛ wɔmbɔdwerew me mberantsɛ: EWURADZE etsiatsia Juda babaa ɔbaabun no do dɛ mbrɛ wotsiatsia wenyintwer mu."
"Ndzɛmba yinom ntsi na musu; m'enyiwa kyi nyinsuwa gu famu; Osiandɛ ɔwerɛkyekyefo a ɔbɔdwedwe me kra no
column3: ɔnye me ntamu atwe: Me mba ayɛ ekyirpaafo

column2: "Zion tserɛw ne nsamu; naaso obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔkyekye no werɛ; EWURADZE ahyɛ wɔ Jakob ho dɛ
column3: hɔn a wɔabɔ no ho aprɔw nyinara wɔnnyɛ n'atamfo: Jerusalɛm adan efifidze wɔ hɔn mu."

column2: "EWURADZE dzi bem; osiandɛ emi matsew ne mbrasɛm do etua: naaso aman nyina hom ntsie
column3: na hom nhu me yaw: me nkataasia na me mberantsɛ kɔ; wɔkɔ ndɔmmum mu."

column2: "Mefrɛfrɛɛ mo nwewefo
column3: naaso wɔdaadaa me: M'asɔfoe na me mpanyimfo gyaagyaa hɔn sunsum mu wɔ kurow no mu
column4: ber a wɔrohwehwɛ edziban ekenyan hɔn ahoɔdzen no."

column2: "EWURADZE
column3: hwɛ; mowɔ ahokyer mu; mo nson mu hyehye me; M'akoma etwa noho wɔ mo mu; osiandɛ matsew etua kɛsekɛse ntsi. Guado ɛ

column2: "Wɔtsee mbrɛ misii sii nkrum; naaso obi nnyi hɔ a ɔkyekye mo werɛ. M'atamfo nyina atse mo fona; ɔyɛ hɔn dɛw dɛ ɔwo na ayɛ: Ebɛma da a aka ato hɔ no edu
column3: na hɔn so wɔayɛ dɛ emi."

column2: "Ma hɔn emumuyɛ nyina mbra w'enyim; Na yɛ hɔn dɛ mbrɛ edze ayɛ me osian me mbrato nyinara ntsi. Na mo nkrumsi adɔɔ so
column3: na m'akoma atɔ bitsi."
